variable.name: s_mixahead
variable.description: This variable defines the delay time for sounds. How low you can set your sound mixahead depends on your FPS, when you set it too low, your sound will start crackling. Generally, with 72 FPS you should be able to use a delay of 0.06 seconds, if you use the command-line switch "-primarysound", you may be able to go even lower, but results may vary on this.
